tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_data ( 
 game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 schedule_date DATE, 
 home_team VARCHAR, 
 away_team VARCHAR, 
 home_score INT, 
 away_score INT, 
 completed BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE game_schedule (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    game_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    home_team VARCHAR(255),
    away_team VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    games_played INT,
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE Scores (
  score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES GameSchedule(game_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES PlayerStatistics(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_schedules (
 game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 game_date DATE,
 location VARCHAR(50),
 home_team VARCHAR(50),
 away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
 stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 player_id INT,
 game_id INT,
 points INT,
 rebounds INT,
 assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE players (
 player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 player_name VARCHAR(50),
 team_id INT,
 position VARCHAR(20),
 age INT
);
